mapper.select: SELECT finance_id, money, recharge, consume, withdrawals, self_profit, partner_profit, base_profit, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, update_date, acount_id FROM finance_tb WHERE finance_id=#{financeId}

SELECT b.acount_id,b.nickname,b.icon,b.profitMoneyOrderNum,b.profitMoney from ( SELECT a.acount_id, a.nickname, a.icon, (@profitMoneyOrderNum:=@profitMoneyOrderNum+1) as profitMoneyOrderNum ,
(f.self_profit+f.partner_profit+f.base_profit) profitMoney FROM acount_tb a RIGHT JOIN finance_tb f ON a.acount_id=f.acount_id ,(select (@profitMoneyOrderNum:=#{pageNum})) profitMoneyOrderNum WHERE a.role_id=1004 ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} ) b WHERE b.acount_id=#{acountId}

SELECT a.acount_id, a.nickname, a.icon, (@profitMoneyOrderNum:=@profitMoneyOrderNum+1) as profitMoneyOrderNum ,

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(money),0) money, COALESCE(SUM(recharge),0) recharge, COALESCE(SUM(consume),0) consume, COALESCE(SUM(withdrawals),0) withdrawals, COALESCE(SUM(self_profit),0) selfProfit, COALESCE(SUM(partner_profit),0) partnerProfit, COALESCE(SUM(base_profit),0) baseProfit FROM finance_tb
AND acount_id=#{acountId}

select.if:
SELECT COALESCE(sfwtb.money,0) userExpenditure, COALESCE(pfwtb.money,0) platformRevenue, sfwtb.create_date create_date FROM (SELECT SUM(money) money, DATE(create_date) create_date FROM flow_water_tb
AND acount_id=#{acountId}
AND DATE(create_date)>= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(create_date)<= DATE(#{endDate})
AND type> 0
GROUP BY DATE(create_date) ) sfwtb left join (SELECT SUM(money) money, DATE(create_date) create_date FROM flow_water_tb
AND acount_id= #{acountId}
AND DATE(create_date)>= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(create_date)<= DATE(#{endDate})
AND type<0
GROUP BY DATE(create_date) ) pfwtb on DATE(sfwtb.create_date) = DATE(pfwtb.create_date )
